model_answer: The answer is A: [00:02:04 - 00:02:40]. In this segment of the video, the presenter explains how to duplicate the line-work layer to create a 'copy' and also discusses locking the top layer so that shadows fall beneath the line work. Additionally, there is a brief fart sound effect heard at approximately 00:02:35.
The correct answer is D: [00:04:17 - 00:04:42]. The speaker says to right-click, go to Arrange, and Send to Back at this specific time interval in the video.
